gtseq 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Prepares sequence data frame for gt visualization

split_sequences.Rd

Splits the sequence column into 1 column per character

Usage

split_sequences(df, seq_column, names_prefix = "pos_")

Arguments

df

expects 1 row per sequence.

seq_column

the column that contains sequence data

names_prefix

a prefix to add to the resulting columns. Useful for column selection in downstream analysis with gt

Examples


msa |> split_sequences(seq_column = seq)
#> Error in split_sequences(msa, seq_column = seq): could not find function "split_sequences"
msa |> split_sequences(seq_column = seq, names_prefix = "seq_")
#> Error in split_sequences(msa, seq_column = seq, names_prefix = "seq_"): could not find function "split_sequences"
